```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600
library(shiny)
library(bslib)

# Define UI for app that draws a histogram ----
ui <- page_sidebar(
  sidebar = sidebar(open = "open",
    selectInput("year_of_data",
                                label = "Choose Year to Display",
                                choices = list(1749,
                                               1849,
                                               1949),
                                selected = 1749),
  ),
  plotOutput("plot", width=1100)
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  library(datasets)
  library(ggplot2)
  
  data <- datasets::sunspot.month
  autoplot(data)

}

# Create Shiny app ----
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
